alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Itasca County through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Alvwood, or 24 miles east of Bemidji, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Winnibigoshish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
